net.corda.finance.workflows

Class CommercialPaperUtils

  • net.corda.finance.workflows.CommercialPaperUtils

  • public class CommercialPaperUtils

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CommercialPaperUtils INSTANCE 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TransactionBuilder generateIssue(PartyAndReference issuance, Amount<net.corda.core.contracts.Issued> faceValue, java.time.Instant maturityDate, Party notary)
      Returns a transaction that issues commercial paper, owned by the issuing parties key. Does not update an existing transaction because you aren't able to issue multiple pieces of CP in a single transaction at the moment: this restriction is not fundamental and may be lifted later.
      void generateMove(TransactionBuilder tx, StateAndRef<net.corda.finance.contracts.CommercialPaper.State> paper, AbstractParty newOwner)
      Updates the given partial transaction with an input/output/command to reassign ownership of the paper.
      void generateRedeem(TransactionBuilder tx, StateAndRef<net.corda.finance.contracts.CommercialPaper.State> paper, ServiceHub services, PartyAndCertificate ourIdentity)
      Intended to be called by the issuer of some commercial paper, when an owner has notified us that they wish to redeem the paper. We must therefore send enough money to the key that owns the paper to satisfy the face value, and then ensure the paper is removed from the ledger.

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        public static CommercialPaperUtils INSTANCE

    • Method Detail

      • generateIssue

        public TransactionBuilder generateIssue(PartyAndReference issuance,
                                        Amount<net.corda.core.contracts.Issued> faceValue,
                                        java.time.Instant maturityDate,
                                        Party notary)

        Returns a transaction that issues commercial paper, owned by the issuing parties key. Does not update an existing transaction because you aren't able to issue multiple pieces of CP in a single transaction at the moment: this restriction is not fundamental and may be lifted later.

      • generateMove

        public void generateMove(TransactionBuilder tx,
                         StateAndRef<net.corda.finance.contracts.CommercialPaper.State> paper,
                         AbstractParty newOwner)

        Updates the given partial transaction with an input/output/command to reassign ownership of the paper.

      • generateRedeem

        public void generateRedeem(TransactionBuilder tx,
                           StateAndRef<net.corda.finance.contracts.CommercialPaper.State> paper,
                           ServiceHub services,
                           PartyAndCertificate ourIdentity)

        Intended to be called by the issuer of some commercial paper, when an owner has notified us that they wish to redeem the paper. We must therefore send enough money to the key that owns the paper to satisfy the face value, and then ensure the paper is removed from the ledger.

        Throws:
        - if the vault doesn't contain enough money to pay the redeemer.
